summary: Eight classic monsters fight to the death in an explosive wrestling tournament set inside an abandoned and cursed graveyard.
cast: Dave Foley|Art Hindle|Robert Maillet|Jimmy Hart|Herb Dean|Kevin Nash|Lance Henriksen|Jason David Brown|Rj Skinner|Rico Montana|Holly Letkeman|Kelly Couture|Jason Deline|Ari Millen|John Geddes|Matt Griffin|Matt Wiele|Jesse Thomas Cook|Chris Rutte|Chris Lesage|Christopher Goddard|Mark Gibson|Samantha Farrow|Cindy Crossley
title: Monster Brawl
